itunes:title: Episode 788 - Tuesday Night Drinks With Dr. Frank
title: Episode 788 - Tuesday Night Drinks With Dr. Frank
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson sits down with Dr. Frank from the Frank Institute as they have drinks and get real about mental health, what it's like being a UFC ring doctor, hormone therapy, and the real sh*t about experimental drugs like ketamine and micro-dosing acid...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson sits down with Dr. Frank from the Frank Institute as they have drinks and get real about mental health, what it's like being a UFC ring doctor, hormone therapy, and the real sh*t about experimental drugs like ketamine and micro-dosing acid.  This show gets super deep at Ross' dining room in Carolina Beach.  If you are contemplating testosterone therapy call him at 910-679-8534.
